name: SUBARU IMPREZA STI
comment: F1R F29 Gold rims, perfect for any Subar out there on the market. Costs around 900$, great for every build!

name: BMW 760LI
comment: AODHAN AH11 Silver rims, 21 alloys, perfect for every limousine. Big massive rim made from brushed aluminium.

name: HONDA CR-Z
comment: KANSEI ASTRO Hypersilver, this rim is made for every hot hatch out there on the streets. I love it!

name: HONDA ACCORD
comment: ENKEI TS-5 Black, black shiny rims on my sedan, just perfection! I recommend this to anybody who wants to make it car more beautiful.
